meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bulging or swollen.
meanings.sent1: The bulginess of the balloon made it difficult to fit through the door.
meanings.sent2: I noticed the bulginess of the pillow as I fluffed it up.
meanings.sent3: The bulginess of the overstuffed suitcase caused it to burst open at the airport.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks had a slight bulginess, giving her a cherubic appearance.
meanings.sent5: The bulginess of the cloud signaled an impending storm.

meanings.definition: The extent to which something bulges or protrudes.
meanings.sent1: The bulginess of the tire indicated it needed more air.
meanings.sent2: I could see the bulginess of the package as it arrived on my doorstep.
meanings.sent3: The bulginess of the watermelon made it challenging to slice evenly.
meanings.sent4: The bulginess of the hill made it difficult to climb to the top.
meanings.sent5: The bulginess of the tree roots created a tripping hazard on the path.
